label: 古今和歌集
対訳語: Collection of Early and Modern Times
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The first imperial waka anthology, which was edited by Ki no Tsurayuki (873?-945?) and three other minor-bureaucrat poets and submitted to the throne in or around 905 (pp. 431-433).  Also known as Kokinshū [古今集].  [和歌、紀貫之]
